lead_paragraph: Nascar fined Carl Edwards $20,000 for intentionally hitting Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s car at the end of the Busch Series race at Michigan International Speedway on Saturday. Edwards was also placed on probation until the end of the year but did not lose points.
